title: Foreclosure
summary: I made a poster explaining the foreclosure process as it relates to Ten-X.

paragraphs.subtitle: Poster
text: Ten-X has three different lines of business, one of which is Auction.com. Auction.com sells houses that have been foreclosed, either online or in-person through a traditional auction. Whether a house is sold online or in-person depends on the stage it’s in in the foreclosure process. This is all a little confusing, so after the meeting where this process was explained, I turned my notes into this explanatory poster. It’s hanging up at Ten-X.
